mapper.select: select order_num, order_date, order_state from orderlist where member_id = #{member_id} order by order_date desc

select order_num, o.item_num, item_su, item_name, item_price, item_imgpath, item_content_imgpath from orderlist_goods o, sell_item p where order_num = #{order_num} and o.item_num = p.item_num order by order_num desc, o.item_num

SELECT DISTINCT (SELECT COUNT(order_state) from orderlist where order_state='상품준비중') pre,(SELECT COUNT(order_state) from orderlist where order_state='배송중') ship, (SELECT COUNT(order_state) from orderlist where order_state='배송완료') finish from orderlist where member_id = #{member_id}
